content:
I just got an email with some constructive feedback from a user that watched one of my YouTube videos. I've pasted it into a Google Doc, so that I can share it with others. Here is the key point:

"For someone who has never created websites before this first video would be completely incomprehensible. The terms are not defined. The concepts are not defined. The why’s and wherefore’s are not explained at all. You guys are so familiar with web technology that it is second nature to you. You don’t realize that it’s all gobbledygook for new website creators."

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Qsf5gQPPxlHW25yJRNOHuyFFx0bq15ov8XQJcxrHQow/edit?folder=0ABvq_fD3OkbOUk9PVA

I'll be thinking more about how to introduce Backdrop CMS to beginners.
Says this message has no topic. Should we make it mandatory, at least for now? Helps get people used to it
@Herb Makes sense. I've changed the settings to require topics.
